meanings.definition: Make a musical sound, typically a bell or clock.
meanings.sent1: The church bells were chiming loudly on Sunday morning.
meanings.sent2: I love hearing the clock chiming every hour.
meanings.sent3: The bells chiming in harmony made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter chimed like a bell in the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The wind chimes were chiming softly in the breeze.

meanings.sent1: His story is chiming with what the witness said.
meanings.sent2: Their opinions are chiming on the matter at hand.
meanings.sent3: The colors of their outfits are chiming perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts chimed like a well-tuned orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces are chiming together to reveal the picture.
